column1: #text=I decided one day to plant a tree in my front yard .
#text=I was unsure of what sort of tree I should plant so I went online and did research as to which type of tree would be best for my situation .
#text=I settled on a magnificent Norway Pine , as it is common in Northern Minnesota .
#text=I went out to my nearest greenhouse , which I found via Google Maps , and asked them where they kept their saplings -LRB- as I had read that this is how one should plant a tree -RRB- .
#text=I got the sapling and brought it home with me .
#text=It was only six inches high but I knew I could make it grow tall and strong .
#text=I grabbed a shovel and started to dig , one small hole the size of the pot the sapling was in .
#text=I carefully took the sapling out of the pot and placed it into the freshly dug hole .
#text=Filling in the empty parts of the hole with extra dirt , I marveled at my creation .
#text=That was the day I planted a tree in my front yard .
